Shared Expenses Calculator

Project Description

This project is a web application for calculating shared expenses among participants. The application allows users to enter expense data, distribute it among participants, and obtain final results.

Main Features

  • Data Entry: Users can add participants with their names and expense amounts.
  • Calculation of Results: The application calculates the total expense amount, the average amount per participant, and generates a list of transactions to equalize expenses.
  • Display of Results: The application displays the total expense amount, the average amount per participant, and a list of specific money transfers between participants.
  • Additional Features: Ability to clear data, field validation, adaptive design for mobile devices, and the ability to save the result as a PDF or copy to the clipboard.

Technical Requirements

  • Single Page Application: The site is a single-page application.
  • Data Storage: Data is stored in the browser's local storage.
